summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4693 for the improvement of Baker Avenue and 2nd Avenue Northwest, each from West 41st Street to West 45th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54424, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
